attributes.action: Reduce net migration to below 10,000 per annum
attributes.background: Last year, net migration added 313,000 to the UK population, just short of the record high of 331,000 in 2015. We need to end mass migration.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about net migration into the UK, however it is not clear what specific actions you want the Government to take to achieve a reduction in net migration.

If there is a specific action you would like the Government to take to reduce migration to the UK, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563390.
